Terms: Global Agricultural Development (Cambodia) shall have the right to renew the agreement after expiration of the 70-year period. 1 year prior to the expiration of the agreement, Global Agricultural Development (Cambodia) may ask to renew the investment. This renewal can only be made once an approval has been obtained from the Government at the request of the Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries, based upon the previous performance of Global Agricultural Development (Cambodia) and according to the mutual agreement from the Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries on the terms and conditions of the new contract.
